name: Krister Dreyer
description:
'''Krister Dreyer''' (born 11 September 1974 in [[Sandefjord]], Norway), commonly known as '''Morfeus''', is a Norwegian musician, singer, songwriter and multi-instrumentalist.

Morfeus is noted for his work in several bands in Norway, including [[Mayhem (band)|Mayhem]], [[Limbonic Art]], [[Dimension F3H]] and [[Viper Solfa]].
